lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.loan_because: I have an interest and travel/study experience in Latin America. I know that the few dollars I loan have a great purchasing power in other economies and even a small amount can have a transformational impact.
lenders.occupational_info: Teaching, course development, graduate student in Information Technology and Education.

lenders.name: Carl
lenders.loan_because: Access to capital is the cornerstone of starting and growing a small business.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as the audio recordist in a two man camera crew, making television news and documentary programs.

lenders.name: roddy
lenders.loan_because: i can

lenders.name: Wim
lenders.loan_because: We ALL need help sometimes.

lenders.name: Justice
lenders.loan_because: I asked all my school frineds to donate money for Kiva.org at my 4th birthday. Instead of presents we shared $300 with people around the world. I plan to save up more to loan!

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I love to help people who have a dream!
lenders.occupational_info: I help to raise money for a civil rights organization.  We work to make sure that all LGBT citizens in America are safe at home, at work, and in their community.

lenders.name: Yack Better Book Club
lenders.occupation: Book Club Group joined in here.
lenders.loan_because: We read THREE CUPS OF TEA  in our book group and decided to help out someone in Pakistan. When we found our person who needed a agriculture help, we knew we had to help out. I hope others will finish the loan for him. We will read about his progress. Thanks book group and thanks KIVA!
lenders.occupational_info: We are all professionals living in the Denver area who like to read and discuss and help others.

lenders.name: Team Cupcake Love
lenders.loan_because: .....we loan because everyone in the world should have an equal chance to succeed, and we're lucky enough to help others achieve their goals. Kiva allows us to support individuals on a more personal level.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of nine students from Bishop O'Byrne High School in Calgary, Alberta, Canada. Through bakesales and bottle drives, we raised the money to help others around the world.

lenders.name: Shoshi and Shai
lenders.loan_because: We are all partners on this planet. It is our responsibility to help our partners.

lenders.name: Yukiko
lenders.loan_because: I want to get energy of living from the people who is living all over  the world.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: Life is short, and we're all in this together.

lenders.name: Emma
lenders.loan_because: Because even a little effort can make a big difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm in the business of learning, I'm learning skill to make me successful in certain fields.

lenders.name: Chantal
lenders.loan_because: it is important that wealthier countries work to achieve global sustainability, and, in particular,  empowering women is an key step in getting there.
lenders.occupational_info: I help make sure that major developments meet or exceed environmental regulations in Canada.  I help to determine how severe the impacts of developments are on the environment and help to make sure, with the knowledge that we have, that the developments will not impact the environment in a severely non-reversible (non sustainable) way.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I admire people who are taking responsibility for their lives
lenders.occupational_info: I manage an archaeological site

lenders.name: Anne
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can... and others need the help.

lenders.name: Rhett
lenders.loan_because: rich or poor we are all brothers and sisters
lenders.occupational_info: I sit at a computer all day and ware a neck tie...I would rather be outside fishing or working the land! =)

lenders.name: Elisabeth
lenders.loan_because: I admire those who work hard to improve their own lives and those of people around them.
lenders.occupational_info: I make sure that computer software is working correctly before clients but it

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: as large as the world may seem, we are all here together in a closed system and helping others shows our humanity.
lenders.occupational_info: I am responsible for enforcing local critical areas ordinances such as protection of wetlands and fish and wildlife habitat.

lenders.name: Johnny
lenders.loan_because: I believe this is the best return I can get on my donation.  Changing many people's lives with the same dollar.

lenders.name: Tasie

lenders.name: Boeve-Russell Family

lenders.occupational_info: As a crisis counselor I am helping people who are in emotional crisis find hope.

lenders.loan_because: There is a need for new options.

lenders.name: Max
lenders.loan_because: Capitalism doesn't have to be evil.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an engineering student, and hope to fly aircraft in the US Navy in the near future.

lenders.name: David & Ella
lenders.loan_because: This was a gift to us, so we could help other people. We wanted to lend money to people that don't have a lot of money.

lenders.name: Malorie
lenders.loan_because: There is no reason not to. I like to understand stories and I like to see followed through results.
lenders.occupational_info: Working with life saving medical technology within the hospital setting.

lenders.loan_because: we need to help each other, and develop sustainability, equity commerce

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: My husband & I had a few rough years where money was very tight. Now that we have gotten past those hard times, I feel I need to help others who are struggling.  It makes my heart & soul feel good to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a supervisor to a government office staff of 5  women. We process vehicle titles for the public & car dealers. Titles are the legal document that shows you own that property.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: I've had tremendous opportunity in my life and have been blessed in many ways. It's important to me to give back whenever possible and enable opportunities for others.

lenders.name: Oded
lenders.loan_because: It just makes so much sense...

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: It's accountable charity.  It's the gift that keeps on giving, literally.

lenders.name: Shay
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people and I admire the concept.  I'm also Christian and believe that everyone should contribute what they can to better the world in general.
lenders.occupational_info: I positively change lives around the globe every day!  I love it!

lenders.name: Tami
lenders.loan_because: it's a small amount for me, but it could have a much bigger impact in the hands of the women I lend to and their families and communities.
lenders.occupational_info: My company builds parts for cars.  I work with the car companies to make sure our parts are exactly what they need.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the life of someone who has far less than me.
lenders.occupational_info: Corporate employee benefits director - health insurance

lenders.occupational_info: I do media and public relations for an international Christian relief and development organization.

lenders.name: ~debi~
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving forward to those who want to help themselves-everyone deserves a chance.
lenders.occupational_info: I dedicate my time and energy to stop the unnecessary killing in our country's animal shelters

lenders.name: Phill
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Cecilia
lenders.loan_because: I want to help the poor people and I don't know what to do with the money myself.

lenders.name: Tana
lenders.loan_because: I think everyone in this life should have a chance to become what ever they can be.
lenders.occupational_info: My work consist of clipping the hair off of dogs and making them beautiful. I am a reiki practioner and do energy work

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Belle
lenders.loan_because: I want to help God's people.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school and am learning to read and write.  I also play sports and do art crafts.

lenders.name: Derek
lenders.loan_because: I am happy to share what little wealth I have;  what would probably be a great wealth to many KIVA borrowers.  I look forward to their successes and am glad that KIVA exists to allow for these micro-loans.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a large jail as a Registered Nurse.  The inmate population we serve is often in jail for drug or alcohol related offenses.  As a nurse, I evaluate their needs for medical attention, including making sure that any chronic or acute illnesses are addressed at their admissions and that they receive the medical regimen they require.

lenders.name: Lorna
lenders.occupational_info: I work in scientific research.

lenders.name: Plny Tvar
lenders.loan_because: Give a man a fish and he will be full for a day - teach him to fish and he will be fed his whole life!

lenders.name: Yvonne
lenders.loan_because: It feels great to be able to give back some of what I have been blessed with. I think that everyone should be given a chance to better themselves and succeed in life. This is a wonderful organization to be a part of. There is nothing like the feeling of being able to help someone else who is less fortunate. God Bless the people who started this organization. This is truly wonderful work.  Thanks to everyone else who gives. It is my goal to lend at least $100.00 per month. The hardest thing I find is choosing who I lend to. I wish I had a million dollars or could win the lottery because I can honestly say that after I gave to my church this is the next place I would go to distribute funds. I look at the pictures and see the faces and it just makes me smile. I love to get the emails on the updates. I read my lender page several times a week. I love to see where everyone is at and how they are progressing. The money is not important. What is important to me is that they all reach their goals. I wish I could do more to help. My daughter and I are starting and online business. We have not decided exactly what but 50% of all profits are coming here to help those who need it.
lenders.occupational_info: I audit accounts of companies that come to me as uncollectable or the customer is refusing to pay. I try and contact them and see if there is a way to get the account settled. If not I then send the accounts out to attorneys or collection agencies to be resolved.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an attorney who  defends people who are in some trouble.

lenders.name: James, Will & Ally
lenders.loan_because: We want to help other families

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: jesus wants us to love and help one another.
lenders.occupational_info: I assemble high and low pressure switches that are used in hydraulic for military equipment and vehicles to marine,farm ,construction and off -highway vehicles.ect....I love doing my job i try to learn something new every day .

lenders.name: Jerry & April
lenders.occupation: Senior Contract Engineer & Stay at Home Mom
lenders.loan_because: We were given a $25 gift certificate from April's mother (Brenda) for Christmas.  She owns a dancewear clothing store and really appreciates how hard it is to start a business.  We believe it's important to help others.  We admire people that are starting their own business.  We've always been the type of people that believe it's better to give than receive.  It's very rewarding.
lenders.occupational_info:
Jerry works as an pump engineer for a company that makes pumps for chemical and process industries throughout the world.

April is a stay at home mom and manages the household and looks after our 4 year old son John Charles and our 2 year old daughter Lillyanne Rose.

lenders.name: Kathi
lenders.loan_because: i should...i believe in pay it forward...i have many miles to go...
lenders.occupational_info: i teach small children  and i also help parents find quality childcare and help childcare professionals be of quality

lenders.name: Ben McClary
lenders.loan_because: I am a follower of Jesus Christ and He calls us to invest everything that He has given us in sharing His love with the world by meeting our neighbors' needs.

lenders.name: MH Holden
lenders.loan_because:
Travel is a passion on mine. I try to travel in a way that lets me better experience what its like for the people living in those areas.
From those travels I've learned we are all the same, be it from New York or Yeji Ghana, our needs and hopes are not all that different; good health for our children, food for the nights dinner, a safe and warm place to sleep.
Being able to help with a loan lets me feel, in some small part, I've continued that connection.
lenders.occupational_info: I map the land. I measure how things like hills, rivers, roads, and buildings fit and relate to one another. From those measurements I then make "models" of the land and those who need to, can use that information to manage resources or engineer a road, or a bridge or a home.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I'm in a fortunate position to help other people improve their life, that of their loved ones and their community.
lenders.occupational_info: Providing in-patient care to children with psychiatric problems and those with cancer.

lenders.name: Sylvester and Sharon
lenders.loan_because: We want to share the blessings God had given to us with others who are struggling to provide for their families.

lenders.name: Beautiful Independence
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we feel it is important to give back and help other people in the world.

lenders.name: Danuta
lenders.loan_because:
everybody needs a chance to realize
their dreams.

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: I think it is a great way to make a difference right at the grassroots level.

lenders.name: The Walker Family
lenders.loan_because: We love you all. 1 Corinthians 13
lenders.occupational_info: Right now we have everything we need, so we try to share what we can. Our family is strong and we believe in you.

There are over seven billion people on this earth.  If we don't take care of each other, then life on this earth will be unbearable and full of unnecessary suffering for many.
Especially for us privileged people, these loans are a small price to pay and they make a great difference to helping individuals care for themselves and their families, especially in areas where opportunities do not come knocking.

lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student and into rockets and sailing.

Every dime I make filters through Kiva before I spend it. 
This has done a lot to make me happier in my life.

lenders.occupational_info: Regional director for www.dealeebob.com

lenders.occupational_info: I work with charitable organizations and business clients in marketing, fundraising, government relations, and grassroots political activism.

lenders.name: JJMKgroup
lenders.loan_because:
Julio and Jeff decided to help as many people in need as they possibly can. JJMK group was created for the primary purpose of helping people to help themselves live fuller, supercalifragilisticexpialidocious fun lives. 

Thank you Lord. Thank you Jesus. Thank you Friends and Family. 
Julio Macias - CEO and Jeff Knapp - CFO.
lenders.occupational_info: OUR MISSION. JJMK group exists to make a difference in people’s lives by bringing together the best individuals, inspiring persons to provide funds through Kiva producing an ample money stream and advancing more and more research plus developing continuous investment & improvement. We are funding projects for people to make life better and more stress-free as best we can. God bless you all.

lenders.name: Jerry

The gift of a few dollars can save a life, give encouragement, give back pride and self asteem and give back so much that we take for granted.

lenders.occupational_info: Pointless. I watch people throw money away.

lenders.loan_because: We are so grateful to finally have a resource that provides our family the opportunity to effectively help people from all over the world to achieve their ambitions.  Thanks Kiva for giving low income people from all over the world a voice, and asking them, instead of telling them, what they need.  Thanks for giving us this amazing opportunity to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info:
Marianne works in the community helping people access the resources that they need.  
Fraser is a carpenter who builds houses.
Angela is in university to study anthropology (the study of cultures).
Jessica is also in university and works at a shelter for homeless youth.

lenders.occupational_info: I am trained to be a librarian in the school system (grades Kindergarten through 12th).  I currently work in my church nursery while I stay at home with my 3 year old son.

maybe i don´t need it all.

maybe i don´t need it at all.

lenders.occupational_info: stressful and rewarding

lenders.name: Buddy
lenders.loan_because: These loans were made by the students and professors in the Spring 2008 Semester Honors Principles of Marketing class at the University of Louisville.  The class was divided into 5 teams of students and each team selected a specific entrepreneur for a loan.  As these loans are repaid, the funds will be used to make additional loans by students taking this class in the future.

lenders.occupational_info: I'm currently teaching English in Sapporo, Japan.  After I leave here I plan to attend graduate school and continue my studies in the field of international relations.

 I am the supervisor of the Planning Division of Maintenance & Engineering at Midwest Airlines.

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: I have had so many advantages in my life; I just want to share with others.

lenders.name: Terry
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others
lenders.occupational_info: I am disabled

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to help people around the world get closer to their dreams and there are so many great stories.
lenders.occupational_info: I create livable spaces for people to live and work in.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.occupational_info: Student

lenders.name: Authentic Jobs
lenders.loan_because: We offer job opportunities for individuals throughout the world, so we figure it's only fitting to donate a portion of our revenue to help entrepreneurs throughout the world.

lenders.name: Botterill Family
lenders.loan_because:
We like to help people.

Most of these people are hard working who just need a break to get their business going.
lenders.occupational_info:
We are a family of five living in Calgary, Alberta, Canada

Some of the charities we assist are
  www.kiva.org
  www.samaritanspurse.ca.
  www.innfromthecold.org
  www.worldvision.ca

lenders.name: M Sotherden
lenders.loan_because: I own my own stained glass studio, and I am able to be in business because I had help from a lot of people.  Kiva is my way of "paying it forward" to other people trying to live their entrepreneurial dream.
lenders.occupational_info: I make glass art (like the barrette in my photo) to sell to people all over the world.

lenders.name: Tiffany
lenders.loan_because: I'm blessed in my life to be able to.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of the people that run our businesses.

lenders.name: julie
lenders.loan_because: I won a KIVA gift card...pretty sweet
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a biology/environmental science major, and I plan to pursue soil science, soil conservation, soil chemistry, something with soil

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I like the transparency of Kiva.  I like knowing who my money goes to and what's being used for, rather than just throwing money at a charity and never knowing what will come of it.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I think everyone has the ability to change the world in some capacity.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student at Babson College, the country's top school for Entrepreneurship.  I am also helping Mission Schools International open its first two schools in Rwanda.

lenders.name: Alisa
lenders.loan_because: "He has showed you, O man, what is good. And what does the Lord require of you? To act JUSTLY and to love MERCY and to walk HUMBLY with your God." Micah 6:8
lenders.occupational_info: I teach people how to live a healthier life and I coach soccer and track.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.occupational_info: Educating my community about the world, its people, its culture, its politics.

lenders.name: Eric & Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: something small to us can mean the world to others.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel like I'm anonymously helping someone.

lenders.name: Tara
lenders.loan_because: it amazes me how little can help another so much :-)
lenders.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell homes and property.

lenders.name: Jeffrey
lenders.loan_because: I want to support people who are working hard to promote their families and communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach high school students at a Catholic High school in Orange County, California

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: Inequality is immoral, and makes the world unsafe for everyone.

lenders.name: bernie
lenders.loan_because: a little bit goes a long way

lenders.name: Deanne
lenders.loan_because:
I am blessed to have the help and support I have needed throughout life to live well, dream big and to pursue my goals. Every person on earth deserves the same; and I believe each of us can be an earth guardian angel to persons everywhere.  We can all extend ourselves in some small way to be the break , the hope, that someone somewhere needs to make their life better and to pursue their dreams.
Every good deed makes the world greater. 
This organization is a prime example of the reality and the innate goodness of that movement. 
Bravo Kiva.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: Helping people, in big ways or small, puts a smile on my face and makes the world a better place.

lenders.name: K. Marcus
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of giving that is not "charity" nor promotes dependency.  Lending does not foster dependency but rather fosters independence, interdependence and hard work.  This builds pride and self-esteem.
lenders.occupational_info: I attempt to be of service to people by listening and bearing witness to their suffering.  We discuss their problems and work  toward solutions.  I encourage strength, self-sufficiency and community.  I feel very honored to be able to do this type of work.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because:
I am a truly blessed person, I have the kind of life where I have so much..... I am surrounded by LOVE in many forms...

I want to help others who are trying to move from the place they are in right now and move towards a more sustainable lifestyle.

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: hmmm, night out or change a life for the better... damn that was easy to answer
lenders.occupational_info: i am paid to give people money all day long, and now i do it here for fun

lenders.name: Charlie Sherrod
lenders.loan_because: if I can help seed someone's dreams for a better life, what better use of my resources?
lenders.occupational_info: I make things! I develop new ideas that make a difference in the marketplace.

lenders.name: Jay
lenders.loan_because: prosperity and success can help people free themselves from the bondage of myth and superstition.

lenders.name: Erin
lenders.loan_because: If I can help others, I will.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the Mayor of Orange County, Florida focusing on political and environmental issues.  The home of Disney World.

lenders.name: Sally
lenders.loan_because: I am strong believer in microfinance, especially for women in developing countries.  It is immensely satisfying to know that I am able to have such a direct, significant impact on people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Administrator for an organization that works to promote and protect internationally recognized human rights.

lenders.name: Jerry & Sue
lenders.loan_because: "For where your treasure is, there your heart will be also." Gospel of Matthew 6:21

lenders.name: Kristen
lenders.loan_because: It is a biblical principle to loan without interest and I know it is very beneficial to the reciever
lenders.occupational_info: study of art on the computers (graphic design)

lenders.name: Emma
lenders.loan_because: Its always nice to have a helping hand. Just passing it on.
lenders.occupational_info: I clean, feed, and take care of lots of animals at a zoo in Texas! I love my job!

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Trisha
lenders.loan_because: I believe by helping others you also help yourself.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of  other peoples children while the parents work.

lenders.name: Grace
lenders.loan_because: We are all connected. I believe it is possible to make a difference as an individual, a little bit at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at an Art School with students who are trying to work in the field of Animation and Visual Effects.

lenders.name: rocco, isabelle & simon
lenders.loan_because:
we wish that everyone in this world gets the same chance for a good life.
Further we hope that every child will profit from this project, having the probability of enough to eat an education.
lenders.occupational_info: simon is an artist, works with earth, wood,  trash etc. isabelle is a restorer of furniture and objects  made of wood

lenders.name: Mitesh
lenders.loan_because: a mere $25 could make a world of difference to a budding entrepreneur in a less privileged nation
lenders.occupational_info: Create wealth by sharing it

lenders.name: chang
lenders.loan_because: for
lenders.occupational_info: reason

lenders.name: Debraj&Sayantani
lenders.loan_because: We believe we can always take a little bit of comfort from our lives in order to help those who need it most and make a difference in this world. That makes life truly worth living

lenders.name: Nicola
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea, I think it is a good way to help people to help themselves

lenders.name: Haggai Borkow
lenders.loan_because:
"Since Auschwitz we know what man is capable of. 
And since Hiroshima we know what is at stake.
It is an exquisite joy to do what we can!"
lenders.occupational_info: Making others doubt the obvious. Or is it?

lenders.name: Matt D.
lenders.loan_because: Someone gave me a gift on Kiva.  I hope to loan more when I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I volunteer to teach English to Chinese students.

lenders.name: Christofer
lenders.loan_because: I beleeve that we only help, if we help the people produce products they can afford and use in the countries they live in. With my small loan I hope to make life of some people a little better.

lenders.name: THE One Office
lenders.loan_because: We want to help Change the World together with people like you & really make the World a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: We have recently started our own foundation where by we will build schools in remote villages in developing third world countries. From these schools we will hopefully build good communities around them & give the inhabitants & their dependants an opportunity to gain an education & help them develope themselves in readiness for the future.

lenders.name: Frank and Susan
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to help people help themselves!
lenders.occupational_info: Just enjoying  retirement and spending time with  family!

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: I'm blessed with a great job and want to give others the opportunity to enjoy success and prosper.
lenders.occupational_info: My company offers financing/leasing to businesses so they can just pay a monthly payment without ownership.  This is allows companies to have the latest equipment without having to buy it again, they just continue making a monthly payment.  I also create special offers (promotions) and new financial products.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: I have everything I'd ever need and through travelling, I've seen how giving a little can help someone get that extra step up in life and have more hope for the future.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in retail for a big box retailer selling electrical equipment. I am responsible for marketing of specifiic items both in-store and out of home.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I think you define yourself via your acts and not by your words.  I loan to others because if the roles were reversed I would hope someone would lend to me.  I loan because it feels great.  I loan because I think it is an effective way to help others.  I loan because people need the money.
lenders.occupational_info: I help other people do their jobs better.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.occupational_info: I am an archaeologist who studies the use of the past in modern politics and political movements in South America

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: brian
lenders.loan_because: My family in Spain were'nt as privileged as we are here in the states. If i can give someone a helping hand to feed a family or make a community better then i will.
lenders.occupational_info:
I do not make a lot but enough to make myself comfortable. I work in sales. I sell contracts to Hospitals and physician groups that we will do their billing for them.

outsourced accounts recievables

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: It's a darn cool thing to do!
lenders.occupational_info: I consult on income and property taxes.

lenders.name: Marissa
lenders.loan_because: it's not charity.  No one wants "charity", they want to earn with dignity.  Kiva gives them the initiative.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student of psychology and also very involved in a community service organization.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I believe that women need to be empowered to provide a better life for their children and for themselves.  I couldn't have started my business without help and I want to pass along the gift to others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in marketing to find out how to better sell products to people.

lenders.name: Ana
lenders.loan_because: ... I am lucky to be able to help.

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: It is important to know you can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I clean the water.

lenders.name: Timothy
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!

lenders.name: Quentin
lenders.loan_because: It's a way to help people and share the blessings I've been given.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage an access administration team

lenders.name: Lois
lenders.loan_because: It is so rewarding to help someone achieve their goals.

lenders.name: ARTICULATE
lenders.loan_because: What an awesome opportunity to give others opportunities!
lenders.occupational_info: We make really cool e-learning software that anyone can use.

lenders.name: Dona
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping people who are willing to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I build, furnish, stock and staff new medical offices for physicians and hospitals.

lenders.name: Juliana
lenders.loan_because: i realise how privileged i am, and how a small sum in my world can make a huge difference in someone else's.
lenders.occupational_info: i founded and run my own company, which is a website for classical music.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: I believe that it is a privilege to be able to help our neighbors.

lenders.name: Melissa
lenders.loan_because: I like that Kiva is a help-out rather than a hand-out.  I like that my money is going to be repaid, so I can help lots of people with the same initial investment.  I also like that I can hand pick who I invest in and feel that connection with that individual.  I can see exactly where my money is going and have a face to match exactly who I'm lending a hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I run an upscale wine and liquor store and play bass guitar.

lenders.name: Tara
lenders.loan_because: I belive in helping those who help themselves.  Together we can rid the world of povery.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with Computers

lenders.name: laura
lenders.loan_because: Help has been there when I have needed it in the past
lenders.occupational_info: Special needs dog rescuer. I foster deaf bull dogs until they can find a forever home

lenders.name: Patty
lenders.loan_because: I've seen first hand how small loans dramatically improve the lives of not only the entrepreneurs, but their families and communities.

lenders.name: Alan
lenders.loan_because: I think it is very easy to forget how lucky you are and how difficult life can be for others. Luckily I am in a position to help out in my own way to enable a few people to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Business outsourcing.

lenders.name: Kupiec Family
lenders.loan_because: We care about the global community, and believe we have a social responsibility to assist other individuals where possible.
lenders.occupational_info: Pharmacist and Future physician.

lenders.name: Carl & Nachele
lenders.loan_because: Blessing others is one of the biggest blessing of all.

lenders.name: Maria Angélica
lenders.loan_because:
I will want support my family with money of my work. I believe on my qualities for this.
I just need of a chance.
With the money, we'll do a little restaurant, buy more things to cook.
lenders.occupational_info: My daughter, me and my father-in-law do candys, cakes, lunch, typical food and many other foods.

lenders.name: Jodi
lenders.loan_because: it's a wonderful opportunity to help people establish financial independence and foster autonomy
lenders.occupational_info: I am a medical doctor specializing in pathology.

lenders.name: Rob
lenders.loan_because: I feel it's important to give back to communities in need. When I visited Peru in 2007, I learned first hand the struggles that many people faced and this is my small way of helping.
lenders.occupational_info: By providing an enterprise collaboration platform and web conferencing software, I assist companies improve their productivity amongst their colleagues, partners and customers.

lenders.name: Dawn
lenders.loan_because: it is a proven way to help someone improve their quality of life.  It's good to foster the entrepreneurial spirit!
lenders.occupational_info: I have spent 25+ years in the banking industry doing a variety of things, but mostly managing all things relating to marketing communications.

lenders.name: Connie
lenders.loan_because: It is a simple and effective way to help others
lenders.occupational_info: I work with children who have emotional and behavior disabilites.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because:
The borrowers are offering useful goods and services to their communities.  I'm impressed by how resourceful they are in environments that are much more difficult than any I've had to deal with. 

And yet, with each person, there is usually something about their business, their aspirations, their family or their circumstances that is like my own or like someone I know here.  These glimpses make the world seem smaller and friendlier.

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I want to bring more peace to the world
lenders.occupational_info: health care

lenders.name: Neil
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy helping entrepreneurs in developing areas.
lenders.occupational_info: I extend credit to businesses

lenders.name: Adrian
lenders.loan_because: I am passionate about doing something to change the world. Helping others help themselves seems like the best way to do so.

lenders.name: john
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping someone help themselves through hard work
lenders.occupational_info: I print magazines

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I believe it is important to help others less fortunate than yourself. I like Kiva because it gives people the means to help themselves and not a handout.
lenders.occupational_info: I maintain and repair avionic systems for the US Air Force.

lenders.name: Jesse Krembs
lenders.loan_because: because this is one of the best ways to make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with technology, computers, radios and other hackers to make the world a better place.

lenders.name: Tera Eng Dalla
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back and help my native country of Cambodia.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a facilitative leader and I bring people together to solve complex business problems and/or plan for anticipated market demands.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I want to help my fellow business person get going with their businesses, it makes me feel happy.
lenders.occupational_info: I create web sites on the Internet for companies in the United States of America.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I believe we can make the world into a better place one person at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: Full-time freshmen college student.

lenders.name: Solo Travel Network
lenders.loan_because: Supporting individual initiative is a step-by-step pathway to equality for every citizen of our global community.
lenders.occupational_info: International networking among people who travel without a partner.

lenders.name: Nina
lenders.occupational_info: advertising for pharmaceuticals

lenders.name: Pat
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others provide for their families and realize their dreams.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed and want to give back to those who are trying hard to better their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired after working 15 years. I raised 5 children who are all living on their own and having families. I spend my time exploring my country from our RV. We volunteer with Habitat, building houses.

lenders.name: Allie
lenders.loan_because: I think that the work Kiva does in forging relationships all over the world to help those in need, those that otherwise might not have the access to resources they need.

lenders.name: daniel
lenders.loan_because: i believe in freedom ,happiness and abundance of good  . if all of us would do what ever we can to help others, even if it small things that we not really thinking that can change something  , the world will be a better place for all of us with freedom, happiness and abundance.

lenders.name: Debra
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel so good to do this - such a small amount to me, but it means so much to these entrepreneurs who are just trying to support their families.

lenders.name: Bradley
lenders.loan_because: Lending lets me have a positive contact with people who are different from me.
lenders.occupational_info: I am what's called a "water lawyer" in the Western United States.  I represent the federal government in lawsuits to sort out who has rights to drill wells and irrigate from streams in desert areas.

lenders.name: Shawna
lenders.loan_because: I believe that people who have a true desire will make things happen.  Even with uncertain circumstances people are capable of creating miracles in their lives.  Lets help miracles happen.

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help, although I wish I could do more, this is a start.  Hopefully I will be able to contribute more in the future financially, or by recruiting other lenders.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a factory where I assemble automobiles.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people but in a way that is empowering to them and that will have a long-term impact.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the assistant to my company's CEO - I type documents, arrange his travel, organize meetings, and generally make his life easier.

lenders.name: Liz
lenders.loan_because: I have traveled to several of the countries covered by Kiva.   It was amazing to meet people like this who are working so hard to build businesses and support their families in such difficult conditions.  I want to do whatever I can to provide them opportunity to expand.
lenders.occupational_info: As a marketing professional, I shape how and to whom we sell our products as well as what the products need to be.  My work involves selling operational software to large enterprises (like credit card companies, utilities, and health care insurers).
